text: Pekka Juhani Kuusisto (born 17 January 1945) is a Finnish former ice hockey defenceman and Olympian. Kuusisto played with Team Finland at the 1968 Winter Olympics held in Grenoble, France.https://www.hockey- reference.com/olympics/athletes/pekka-kuusisto-1 He previously played for RU-38 Pori and Ilves Tampere in SM-Liiga.Society for International Hockey Research Database, retrieved June 29, 2015 ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey players from Tampere Category:Finnish ice hockey defencemen Category:Ice hockey players at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Finland Category:Ilves players
title: Pekka Kuusisto (ice hockey)
